info.title: VisageCloud
info.description: Face search, recognition & classification API. Just make a call to our REST API each time your app needs to access face recognition and classification capabilities.

license.name: As per Developer Terms of Use

tags.name: Analytics for presence and audience
tags.description: Retrieve analytics for presence and audience

get.summary: Compare several faces identified by faceHash, without depending on mapping faces to profiles

parameters.name: accessKey
parameters.description: The accessKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: secretKey
parameters.description: The secretKey or readOnlyKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: faceHashes
parameters.description: The IDs of the faces which you want compared, comma-separated

parameters.name: showDetails
parameters.description: Show details

post.summary: Perform detection on a given picture or picture URL

parameters.name: accessKey
parameters.description: The accessKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: secretKey
parameters.description: The secretKey or readOnlyKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: storeAnalysisPicture
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want the picture of the analysis to be stored for later retrieval

parameters.name: storeFacePictures
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want the faces inside the picture to be stored for later retrieval

parameters.name: storeResult
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want the result of the analysis to be stored

parameters.name: retentionTime
parameters.description: How many seconds the results should be retained in stoarage?

parameters.name: pictureURL
parameters.description: The URL of the picture, assuming it is served by a third party server. Server should be accesible from the Internet or through another netwoek by VisageCloud infrastructure

parameters.name: algorithmVersion
parameters.description: Algorithm version (V2 is more performant but not backward compatible)

parameters.name: autoRotate
parameters.description: Auto-rotate to find flipped or rotate faces

parameters.name: skipEXIF
parameters.description: Skip EXIF rotation procesing

parameters.name: waitForPictureUpload
parameters.description: Waits until the picture is successfully uploaded, before returning the response back the the client

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: [For advanced users only] Change feature filters for robustness of feature extraction. Tweaking this parameter may affect per

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: [For advanced users only] Options for preprocessing of image.

picture.description: The multipart/form-data version of the image, in case a direct upload is used. At least one of picture or pictureURL must be present

get.summary: Retrieve the last *count* operations per current account

parameters.name: accessKey
parameters.description: The accessKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: secretKey
parameters.description: The secretKey or readOnlyKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: How many records to retrieve at a time

post.summary: Perform labeled recognition on a given picture or picture URL

parameters.name: accessKey
parameters.description: The accessKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: secretKey
parameters.description: The secretKey or readOnlyKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: storeAnalysisPicture
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want the picture of the analysis to be stored for later retrieval

parameters.name: storeFacePictures
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want the faces inside the picture to be stored for later retrieval

parameters.name: storeResult
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want the result of the analysis to be stored

parameters.name: retentionTime
parameters.description: How many seconds the results should be retained in stoarage?

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: Uniquely identified collection that can store multiple profiles

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Labels associated with the given picture or picture URL

parameters.name: attributeFilters
parameters.description: Filters that will be applied on the recognition operation

parameters.name: pictureURL
parameters.description: The URL of the picture

parameters.name: algorithmVersion
parameters.description: Algorithm version (V2 is more performant but not backward compatible)

parameters.name: autoRotate
parameters.description: Auto-rotate to find flipped or rotate faces

parameters.name: skipEXIF rotation processing
parameters.description: Skip EXIF rotation procesing

parameters.name: waitForPictureUpload
parameters.description: Waits until the picture is successfully uploaded, before returning the response back the the client

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: [For advanced users only] Change feature filters for robustness of feature extraction. Tweaking this parameter may affect per

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: [For advanced users only] Options for preprocessing of image.

parameters.description: Preprocessor

parameters.description: Classification attribute name

parameters.name: considerViewPoints
parameters.description: Consider view point

parameters.description: Seed for divididing training and evaluation sets

parameters.description: Training ratio

parameters.name: probabilityParameter

parameters.description: Gamma parameter

parameters.name: nuParameter
parameters.description: Nu parameter

parameters.name: cParameter
parameters.description: c parameter

parameters.name: svmTypeParameter
parameters.description: SVM type parameter

parameters.description: Cache size parameter

parameters.name: epsParameter
parameters.description: Eps parameter

post.summary: Adds (maps) a list of faces, identified by faceHashes, to a profile, identified by profileId

parameters.description: The profile that will store the face

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: The collection that contains the profile

delete.summary: Removes (unmaps) a list of faces, identified by faceHashes, from a profile, identified by profileId

parameters.description: The collection that contains the profile

post.summary: Creates a new profile with no faces associated to it (empty profile)

parameters.name: collectionId
parameters.description: Uniquely identified collection that can store multiple profiles

parameters.name: externalId
parameters.description: External reference to additional information you dont want to share with VisageCloud

parameters.name: screenName
parameters.description: Human-readable label for the profile

parameters.name: labels
parameters.description: Allows you to do finer filtering in face recognition

parameters.name: classificationAttributes
parameters.description: Comma separated key:value classification attributes

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Comma separated key:value details of profile

post.summary: Create new stream with given name

parameters.name: accessKey
parameters.description: The accessKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: secretKey
parameters.description: The secretKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the stream that will be created

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The url of the stream

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: Streaming method

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password

parameters.name: skipFramesWithNoFaces
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want the original picture to be stored for later retrieval

parameters.name: retentionTime
parameters.description: Number of seconds for frames to be kept. Default is 605000s (7 days)

parameters.name: storeOriginalFrames
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want the original picture to be stored for later retrieval

parameters.name: storeAttendanceFaces
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want to store permanently store faces clippings of the recognized faces

parameters.name: storeAttendanceFrames
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether you want to store permanently store frames with a recognized face in them

parameters.name: isActive
parameters.description: Boolean value indicating whether the stream is currently active or not

parameters.name: associatedCollections
parameters.description: List of collection ids which will be used to measure attendance

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Attributes of the stream

parameters.name: accessKey
parameters.description: The accessKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: secretKey
parameters.description: The secretKey provided by VisageCloud

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the stream that will be removed
